topics.description: Sent when a single SoundBank is generated. This could be sent multiple times during SoundBank generation, for every SoundBank generated and for every platform. To generate SoundBanks, refer to \ref ak_wwise_core_soundbank_generate or \ref ak_wwise_ui_commands_execute with one of the SoundBank generation commands. Refer to \ref globalcommandsids for the list of commands.

infoFile.description: Embed the JSON SoundBank info file in the response.

bankData.description: Embed the base64 SoundBank data in the response.

pluginInfo.description: Embed the JSON PluginInfo file in the response.

return.description: Data to be returned for the SoundBank generated. Refer to \ref wobjects_index for more information on the properties available.

switchContainer.description: Association of switch container value to its used resources.

SwitchValue.description: Group id and value used for switch container.

GUID.description: GUID of the switch container value used.

Default.description: Whether the Switch/State value is the switch container's default. If not specified then the value is false.

MediaRefs.description: List of all media files used by this event.

ExternalSourceRefs.description: List of all external sources used by this event.

PluginRefs.description: List of all plug-ins used by this event.

Children.description: Children of this switch container value.

items.description: Child entry of the switch container

color.description: Color index for this object. To determine the RGB values, consult the theme color definitions in Authoring\Data\Themes\dark\main.json, and locate the ObjectColor_PaletteColor entries.

soundbank.description: The generated SoundBank. Use the return options to obtain specific details.

platform.description: The platform for which the SoundBank was generated.

language.description: The language for which the SoundBank was generated. Only present when generating a SoundBank for a specific language.

error.description: The error message, if an error occurred. Only present if an error occurred.

bankData.description: SoundBank data object containing the actual data encoded in base64 and the size.

data.description: Data of the SoundBank encoded in base64.

size.description: Size of the SoundBank data when decoded.

Id.description: Short ID of the resulting bank encoded in a string.

Language.description: The name of the language being used in this SoundBank.

Path.description: The file name of the SoundBank.

Type.description: SoundBank type. If the SoundBank is defined by the user, then the type is 'User'. Otherwise, the bank was auto defined by Wwise.

Hash.description: Hash value (128-bit) written to the associated SoundBank .bnk file. Used during SoundBank generation to check existing .bnk files for changes.

Align.description: Required alignment for media file. If not specified then the alignment is 16 bytes.

DeviceMemory.description: Does the media requires device memory or not.

Media.description: All media files referenced by this SoundBank with their information.

ExternalSources.description: All external sources referenced by this SoundBank with their information.

Events.description: All the events included in this SoundBank with their information.

MaxAttenuation.description: The max distance for the attenuation of the event as a floating point value.

DurationType.description: The kind of duration, possible values: OneShot, Unknown, Infinite, Mixed.

DurationMin.description: The minimum value for the duration as a floating point value.

DurationMax.description: The maximum value for the duration as a floating point value.

MediaRefs.description: List of all media files used by this event.

ExternalSourceRefs.description: List of all external sources used by this event.

PluginRefs.description: List of all plug-ins used by this event.

AuxBusRefs.description: List of all Aux Busses referenced by this event.

ActionSetState.description: List of set State actions in Event.

GroupId.description: Short ID of the State Group.

ActionSetSwitch.description: List of set Switch actions in Event.

GroupId.description: Short ID of the Switch Group.

ActionTrigger.description: List of Trigger actions in Event.

ActionSetFX.description: List of Set Effect actions in Event.

SwitchContainers.description: List of association of switch container value to its used media.

DialogueEvents.description: All the dialogue events included in this SoundBank with their information.

Id.description: Short ID of the dialogue event.
Short ID of the dialogue event.

Busses.description: List of all AuxBus used in this SoundBank.

MaxAttenuation.description: The max distance for the attenuation of the bus as a floating point value.

AuxBusRefs.description: List of Aux Busses referenced by this event.

AuxBusses.description: List of all AuxBus used in this SoundBank.

MaxAttenuation.description: The max distance for the attenuation of the aux bus as a floating point value.

AuxBusRefs.description: List of all Aux Busses referenced by this event.

GameParameters.description: List of all the Game Parameters/RTPC used in this SoundBank.

Id.description: Short ID of the Game Parameter.

Triggers.description: List of all Triggers used in this SoundBank.

StateGroups.description: List of State Group included in this SoundBank.

Id.description: Short ID of the State Group.

States.description: List of State included in this StateGroup.

SwitchGroups.description: List of SwitchGroup included in this SoundBank.

GameParameterRef.description: Game Parameter used to control the Switch Group.

Id.description: Short ID of the Game Parameter.

Switches.description: List of the Switch contained in this SwitchGroup.

AcousticTextures.description: List of all Acoustic Textures used in this SoundBank.

Id.description: Short ID of the Acoustic Texture.

BasePlatform.description: The base platform the current platform is based off.

DLL.description: Name of the DLL for the plugin.

StaticLib.description: Name of the static lib for the plugin.
